extendedInfo.description: Create and edit colors using different color models (RGB, ARGB, HSV, AHSV) and display values as decimal, hexadecimal or percentage, you can also choose colors from the color palette, and save them in "My colors" list and "Favorites" list.Don't hesitate to share colors with friends and family by clicking "Share" button.Great for design projects and education purpose..Enjoy the App, it's free and without ads.

reviews.title: What\'s the point?
reviews.comment: The app allows for creating all the possible RGB colours and alpha channel manipulatin and then provides no way to save the chosen colour off as a file that could be used vor wallpaper or lock screen or something else.  Sharing or emailing is simply a reference to the chosen colour and a link to this app.   Overall not sure what the point of this app is.
reviews.author: A Google User
